high_schools.text: The closest high school is within a 15-to-20-minute walk.

primary_schools.text: At least one elementary school within a 5-to-10-minute walk.

transit_friendly.text: Within walking distance of rapid transit and frequent bus lines.

groceries.text: The nearest general grocery store is within a 10-minute walk, and there is also a moderate number of specialist food stores nearby.

restaurants.text: A wide variety of restaurants are within a short walk.

pedestrian_friendly.text: All day-to-day needs are within a few minutes' walk.

greenery.text: Some trees on the street, with some parks nearby.

cycling_friendly.text: Variety of cycling-friendly infrastructure nearby, connecting a moderate number of destinations.

car_friendly.text: Arteries nearby, but traffic congestion and parking problems are possible.

vibrant.text: Vibrant atmosphere at various times of the day.

shopping.text: A wide variety of fashion stores are within a short walk.

daycares.text: At least one daycare within a 2-minute walk.

nightlife.text: Several bars are within a short walk.

cafes.text: A variety of cafés are within a short walk.

parks.text: Several large parks and other smaller parks in the area.
